name: School Lunch Maker!
description:
Today is a nice day! Our canteen is getting busy again! So many students come here for the yummy school lunch foods!
There are so many food options for this special lunch time! Such as vanilla strawberry ice cream cake, pizza, corn dog, burger and the most popular ice cream soda!
Join us to cook, decorate and eat these yummy foods! Come on! Let’s get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy Back to School lunch foods
-Five kinds of foods to make: vanilla strawberry ice cream cake, pizza, corn dog, burger and ice cream soda
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: bowls, spatula, cream mixer, ice cream maker, oven, cake molds, cake stand, rolling pin, pizza cutter, flour sieve, corn dog maker, sushi bun molds, knife, grill, frying tong, freezer, ice cube molds, soda dispenser, ice cream dispenser, straws and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: fruits, candies, sprinkles, milk, flour, salt, sugar, butter, flour, sauce, cheese, veggies, meats, corn flour, burger buns, sesame, rice, water, ice, ice cream, soda and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different cooking modules for vanilla strawberry ice cream cake, pizza, corn dog, burger and ice cream soda
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits and straws

Important Message for Purchases:

- By downloading this App you agree to SHAKE IT’s Privacy Policy at https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/privacy-policy/
- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
